#summary Performance comparison of [http://sqljet.com/ SQLJet] to [http://sqlite.org SQLite].

= Benchmarks =

Version 1.0.0 of [http://sqljet.com/ SQLJet] is compared to SQLiteJDBC (v056 NestedVM and v3.6.14.2 of native SQLite through JNI).

Summary (from fastest to slowest):

|| SQLLite 3.6.14 || 10,123 sec ||
|| SQLJet 1.0.0 || 10,502 sec ||
|| NestedVM v056 || 76,59 sec ||
